articles.content:
Reckless remarks
     Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The South Korean authorities openly revealed their intention to resume "Team Spirit" joint military maneuvers, which have been suspended since 1994.
    The "Defense Ministry" submitted an "answer" to the "National Assembly" recently, which said "the 'Team Spirit' maneuvers were not suspended for good, but will be resumed any time if South Korea and the United States agree to do them," according to the Seoul-based Munhwa Broadcasting Corporation. 
    This dangerous argument should never be overlooked because it synchronized with shipment of huge armed forces of the U.S. to South Korea under the pretext of the Yugoslav crisis.

articles.title: Ardent desire of Korean nation for reunification  reflected
articles.content:
Kim Jong Pil's utterances
   Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Pil, a main architect of "Yusin," showed up in Jeju Island, South Korea, on April 30 to give a lecture on the so-called "political reforms," according to a radio report from Seoul.   
   In the lecture this brazen-faced guy asserted not only statesmen but also voters who have turned to them for something are to blame for the existing politics manipulated by money.
   This is an intolerable insult to the people.
Kim Jong Pil joined hands with political prostitute Kim Young Sam first and then with the present chief executive to come  into power offering a windfall.
   Such a guy blinded with money has shifted the blame for "money-manipulated politics" onto the voters. The people will never pardon this wicked man insulting them.
